start.text: Set reactor output to combat levels.
Let's play this by the numbers.

start_boss.text: Stick to the plan, and even THAT monster can be destroyed.

retreat.text: Discretion is the better part of valor.
Today is not my day to be one with the void.

out_of_missiles.text: Missile racks are out of ordnance.
We have used all of our expendable ordnance.

engaged.text: It is time to conclude this battle.

need_help.text: I don't think I am going to make it without reinforcements.
Mission outcome is looking... Not good.

running.text: Pulling back, we should reform our battle lines.

hull_90.text: Prepare a damage control team, the battle has only just begun.
Armor plating has been breached, but internal compartments are still holding.

hull_30.text: All hands, prepare to abandon ship!
The reactor's coolant pressure is dropping!
Bulkheads are buckling, I am not going to last much longer!

death.text: I die so you may live.
The ship is volatile, get away from us!

victory.text: We taught them the meaning of ship superiority.
That was damn fine shooting boys.
The battle is won, let us not forget the dead.
